attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I was looking for a good app to further educate myself in the topic of our current president, but it seems upon launching the app, it just blasts this loud music that seems to have attracted tarantulas and cockroaches. This is a horrible representation of our country, I will be deleting immediately!

attributes.title: black lives matter 😘🤷🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch and I was only here for the orange 🍊 king 👑 but nothing was working I do not recommend this app because it is horrible now TRUMP how does it feel to have the worst app in America ? You can’t stop Gen-Z bahaha your bad 🥱

attributes.title: absolutely aMaZiNg
attributes.review: this app is beyond me. it is... HORRIFYING THAT THE APP HAS SO MANY POP UP ADDS ABOUT THEM WANTING TO KIDNAP MY KIDS. i went to call customer service for help BUT ALL I GOT WAS SCREAMING AND MOANING they were obviously getting busy!!! the disgrace that this app bring to society, to the amazing quality of life. terrible just TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!!!! i want it removed asap!!!!

This is so disappointing. As soon as this app had been downloaded onto my device, my grandmother had 2 strokes one after another. I also ended up stepping on a crack and breaking my mothers back😿this is a truly cursed useless application😹🕺😹😫😁👁👄👁

attributes.title: This app should not be on the app store.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of trying to see what all the trumpets/troompa loompas see in our current president. i was looking at everything and seeing all the stuff trump has done and it made me so angry and hot i fainted and had a seizure. this app is DANGEROUS >:(

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️✨worst app ever✨🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: First of all, I downloaded this app to be educated on our president. BUT, I quickly deleted it due to how it kept glitching to trumps nose 😩 I almost had a heart attack multiple times when this would happen... 👃🏻 not safe in my opinion. This app ain’t it

attributes.title: Horrible. Just so horrible. Freaking terrible.
attributes.review: If I could give this app 0 stars I would but that’s not quite possible. So you’re welcome I can only do 1. The app is horribly laid out and unorganized and makes my phone tweak out any time I open it.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: Worst app ever!!! Glitches like crazy and it made my phone freeze many times to the point I thought I had to get it fixed. Now that I have deleted the app my phone still glitches sometimes but not as like before

attributes.title: Don’t recommend.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes for a reason to actually like this xenophobic, racist, misogynistic, self centered, racist shell of a man. And it did was send me points. What am I gonna do put those into an arcade? Overall no evidence was found to overthrow my original thoughts. TRUMP 2020 🧚🌱💫✨in a grave🌼🧚🧚 😌

attributes.title: dumpitytrumpity
attributes.review: Thought i would gain some insight on why people claim to love trump but the app wouldn’t even let me open it! Technical difficulties i guess. Not to mention that  my phone is now glitching so bad that i cant even text people back. What a shame!
